creator: Smood.ch
descriptionHtml:
No idea for breakfast, lunch or dinner? No worries, we are here to deliver!
Smood is the leading Swiss local delivery service for delivering your favorite restaurants. At home, at the office, wherever you are, you just need to order in a few clicks from our more than 500 partner restaurants and you will be able to enjoy the quick delivery time for your dishes.

World cuisine and top local partner restaurants

Smood finely selects its local partner restaurants to offer you the best of Switzerland: burgers, sushi, pizza, fresh pasta or gourmet restaurants, everything is possible, because our delivery staff will deliver by car and also with a smile!

Luigia, Vapiano, Molino and many others will satisfy your Italian desires: Pizza, pasta, homemade desserts from the mama are on the program.
On the Asian side with its delicious sushi, we will make you salivate in front of the creations of Yoogi's, Sushitime, Negishi and we will also go through the Thai side and its spicy flavors.
For America cheerleaders and its burgers, you will have a wide choice: Burger King, Black Tap, THF, Blaqk Burger, FMR, Jack&Jo, B.Good, L’Artisan...
Not water in your mouth yet? We can also deliver the best Indian, Mexican, Chinese restaurants...
So is it fast food or healthy? No more differences with Smood, we will always deliver the best to you!

100% Swiss delivery service, close to your needs

To satisfy you even more with delicious dishes, our delivery service is regularly extended to new Swiss cities. After Geneva and Lausanne, we now also deliver Montreux, Vevey, Nyon, Sion, Fribourg, Lucerne, Winterthur, Zug and Zurich. Do you also want to be delivered? Feel free to suggest that we serve new cities on our social networks! Precision and not the least, we deliver up to 12km from each of our partner restaurants. If you live a few kilometers from the city centre, you can also enjoy home delivery.

As close as possible to you

In order to get to know you better, we regularly come to meet you in the cities where we’re present. We also offer local dishes and delicious discounts according to the seasons and local festivals (Escalade celebration in Geneva, Sechseläuten in Zurich...)
All of its animations will of course be available on the homepage of our application, so open it regularly!

A customer service present for you 7 days a week

Ordering on the application is one thing but having quality customer service and local knowledge is another! To help you in all the steps of your order, our 100% Swiss customer service is available 7 days a week. Do you want to change the delivery address? Add items to your order? Call us directly via the application.

An application regularly reviewed for your comfort of use
We are not the type to rest on our achievements, which is why your customer journey will be regularly reviewed. You will be able to find your restaurant smoothly, choose your menu and options, order and have it delivered as soon as possible.

Are you ready to go? One, two, three, enjoy!

If you appreciate our service, don't hesitate to give us a little help by rating us on the Play store. Thank you for everything and see you soon with Smood!
descriptionShort: No cooking idea? Smood is here

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We continually update our app to give you the best experience possible. Come back on a regular basis to see the latest fixes and new features.
Do you like our application ? Do not hesitate to give us a rating! Your comments contribute to the improvement of Smood. Your satisfaction is our priority.

title: Smood - Food delivery service

creator: Smood.ch
descriptionHtml:
Switzerland’s Food and Grocery Delivery App

Huge fan of freshly prepared meals, but not the hassle of cooking or shopping? Us too. Find everything you need with Smood and get it delivered by the true Swiss Food Delivery App in 45 minutes.

Smood was born 2012 in Switzerland. Our purpose? To make the lives of our customers more comfortable. Today, we are the only Swiss delivery app. We are active in over 40 cities across Switzerland. And we won't stop there - we are constantly improving our service to ensure the best possible experience for you and our partners.

FIND YOUR FAVOURITE RESTAURANTS
Browse your nearby restaurants and search for food by cuisine, restaurant name, dish or meal. Choose from Switzerland’s best selection of restaurants and a large variety of food to order: Pizza. Pasta. Sushi. Ramen. Burgers. Chinese and so much more... Order now from over 1’700 restaurants using the Smood app.

FIND YOUR FAVOURITE MIGROS PRODUCTS
Find your favourite grocery products from Migros on the Smood app. Order from a variety of over 6’000 products, always at the same price as in the store. Find vegetables, fruit, meat, dairy products, a bakery selection, hygiene products and many more. Delivered directly to you in 45 minutes with the Smood app.

DELIVERY OR PICK-UP
You can order ahead for Pick-up instead of waiting for a delivery. Select Pick-up in the app, add your favourite meals, place the order and go to your local restaurant to grab your food. Or, you can choose the new ‘no-contact delivery’ option and request that your order be left at your doorstep.

CUSTOMER SERVICE
Our customer support is available everyday from 7am to midnight. You can reach out through phone, email, live chat and Facebook. We are happy to help you in case you have any questions.

DELIVERY STAFF
We have the best delivery staff in Switzerland. Because our drivers are employed by Smood, they are paid fair wages, have social benefits and are insured. We make sure we provide the best service in Switzerland.

EASY PAYMENT
Pay easily with a credit card (Visa, Master, American Express), PostFinance, Lunch-Check or Paypal. Add different payment methods easily. Enter promo codes or gift cards to redeem a discount on your order.

LOCAL AND INTERNATIONAL RESTAURANTS
Black Tap, Chez Philippe, Burger King, McDonald’s, Subway, Vapiano, Baur’s at Home, Marcel, The Hamburger Foundation, Molino, KFC, Bao Canteen, HATO, Yooji’s, Stripped Pizza, Rice Up!, Nooba, Pancs, The Green Van Company and many many more...

Please feel free to reach out to us at any time with your comments and feedback on support.smood.ch

And we won't stop there - we are constantly improving our service to ensure the best possible experience for you and our partners.

FIND YOUR FAVOURITE RESTAURANTS
Browse your nearby restaurants and search for food by cuisine, restaurant name, dish or meal. Choose from Switzerland’s best selection of restaurants and a large variety of food to order: Pizza. FIND YOUR FAVOURITE MIGROS PRODUCTS

DELIVERY OR PICK-UP

CUSTOMER SERVICE

title: Smood – Swiss Food Delivery

creator: Smood.ch
descriptionHtml:
Too busy to prepare dinner? Order online with Smood & get Swiss food delivered to your doorstep from 1800+ Top restaurants within 45 minutes. Select from 6000+ Migros products to take care of all your grocery needs.

Enjoy Swiss food from the finest restaurants across 40 cities in Switzerland.

Order Food Online
Get offers & meals delivered from fast food chains like:

● Burger King

● McDonald’s

● KFC

● Subway


What makes Smood the right choice?

✅ Find the best offers & deals on your favorite meals

✅ Choose between online food delivery or Click & Collect service

✅ New and original Swiss meals

✅ Multiply your savings with exclusive Grocery Offers

✅ Customer service that you can count on


App Features

🥡 Order from top restaurants nearby
Get the latest offers for international cuisines, Swiss cuisine, restaurant dishes, and fast food in the market. Enjoy restaurants’ top-quality meals and takeout at home. Grab exciting deals on your next KFC, Burger King or McDonald’s takeaway.

🥫 Shop from Migros
Get 6000+ Migros products delivered to your doorstep by ordering groceries online. Choose from a variety of groceries like organic products, poultry, hygiene products and more.

🧤 Safety
All meals are prepared, handled, packaged, and delivered safely. Smood’s well-trained team of drivers ensures the safest and consistent delivery experience for you.

🛍 Click & Collect
By choosing "Click and Collect", you can pick up your order from a location of your choice.

🚚 Delivery Staff
Smood's drivers are well paid, insured & have social benefits. Services are provided in a professional and safe manner, ensuring timely delivery of orders.

🏨 Local restaurants
Order food online from top local restaurants like Black Tap, Vapiano, Baur’s, Marcel, The Hamburger Foundation, Molino, etc to experience the best of the local and Swiss cuisine.

🎕 Florist
Check out the florist section of the app for a wide range of flowers & bouquets. Discover all local florists in your area or within the selected area for your interest.

📑 Recipes
From cookies to pizza, there are recipes for you to try! Discover a variety of recipes from Swiss, American, European, Chinese, Italian cuisines, and more.

💳 Hassle-free payments
Paying for your orders is both easy and safe on Smood. Payments can be made via credit card (Visa, American Express), PostFinance, Lunch-Check, Paypal, and also TWINT.

⌚ Track your order
Get live tracking and real-time status updates for your orders from the app. From the restaurant to your front door, you can track the location of your Delivery Partner on a map.

📱 Customer Service
Contact us by email, chat bot, or even use Facebook Messenger to resolve any questions or issues related to your delivery.


Here’s what Smood offers:

✔ Food ordering made fast, safe and easy

✔ Order takeaways from Multiple Cuisines

✔ Smart Grocery shopping from home

✔ Enjoy hassle-free ordering whether you're at home or away


🗣 Have Queries? Reach out to us at

📧Email: support@smood.ch
📞Phone: +41 900 009 009


🙋‍♀️ Let’s Connect

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/smood.ch/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/smood.ch

Terms of conditions
https://www.smood.ch/en/terms-of-service

Privacy Policy
https://www.smood.ch/en/privacy-policy

Don't forget to treat yourself today! Download the app now!

What makes Smood the right choice?

App Features

🥡 Order from top restaurants nearby
Get the latest offers for international cuisines, Swiss cuisine, restaurant dishes, and fast food in the market. Enjoy restaurants’ top-quality meals and takeout at home. Grab exciting deals on your next KFC, Burger King or McDonald’s takeaway.

🥫 Shop from Migros
Get 6000+ Migros products delivered to your doorstep by ordering groceries online. Choose from a variety of groceries like organic products, poultry, hygiene products and more.

🧤 Safety
All meals are prepared, handled, packaged, and delivered safely. Smood’s well-trained team of drivers ensures the safest and consistent delivery experience for you.

🛍 Click & Collect
By choosing "Click and Collect", you can pick up your order from a location of your choice.

🚚 Delivery Staff
Smood's drivers are well paid, insured & have social benefits. Services are provided in a professional and safe manner, ensuring timely delivery of orders.

🏨 Local restaurants
Order food online from top local restaurants like Black Tap, Vapiano, Baur’s, Marcel, The Hamburger Foundation, Molino, etc to experience the best of the local and Swiss cuisine.

🎕 Florist
Check out the florist section of the app for a wide range of flowers & bouquets. Discover all local florists in your area or within the selected area for your interest.

📑 Recipes
From cookies to pizza, there are recipes for you to try! Discover a variety of recipes from Swiss, American, European, Chinese, Italian cuisines, and more.

💳 Hassle-free payments
Paying for your orders is both easy and safe on Smood. Payments can be made via credit card (Visa, American Express), PostFinance, Lunch-Check, Paypal, and also TWINT.

⌚ Track your order
Get live tracking and real-time status updates for your orders from the app. From the restaurant to your front door, you can track the location of your Delivery Partner on a map.

📱 Customer Service
Contact us by email, chat bot, or even use Facebook Messenger to resolve any questions or issues related to your delivery.


Here’s what Smood offers:

✔ Food ordering made fast, safe and easy

✔ Order takeaways from Multiple Cuisines

✔ Smart Grocery shopping from home

✔ Enjoy hassle-free ordering whether you're at home or away

title: Smood: Food Delivery & Take Away | Online Grocery

creator: Smood.ch
descriptionHtml:
Switzerland’s Food and Grocery Delivery App

Huge fan of freshly prepared meals, but not the hassle of cooking or shopping? Us too. Find everything you need with Smood and get it delivered by the true Swiss Food Delivery App in 45 minutes.

Smood was born 2012 in Switzerland. Our purpose? To make the lives of our customers more comfortable. Today, we are the only Swiss delivery app. We are active in over 40 cities across Switzerland. And we won't stop there - we are constantly improving our service to ensure the best possible experience for you and our partners.

FIND YOUR FAVOURITE RESTAURANTS
Browse your nearby restaurants and search for food by cuisine, restaurant name, dish or meal. Choose from Switzerland’s best selection of restaurants and a large variety of food to order: Pizza. Pasta. Sushi. Ramen. Burgers. Chinese and so much more... Order now from over 1’700 restaurants using the Smood app.

FIND YOUR FAVOURITE MIGROS PRODUCTS
Find your favourite grocery products from Migros on the Smood app. Order from a variety of over 6’000 products, always at the same price as in the store. Find vegetables, fruit, meat, dairy products, a bakery selection, hygiene products and many more. Delivered directly to you in 45 minutes with the Smood app.

DELIVERY OR PICK-UP
You can order ahead for Pick-up instead of waiting for a delivery. Select Pick-up in the app, add your favourite meals, place the order and go to your local restaurant to grab your food. Or, you can choose the new ‘no-contact delivery’ option and request that your order be left at your doorstep.

CUSTOMER SERVICE
Our customer support is available everyday from 7am to midnight. You can reach out through phone, email, live chat and Facebook. We are happy to help you in case you have any questions.

DELIVERY STAFF
We have the best delivery staff in Switzerland. Because our drivers are employed by Smood, they are paid fair wages, have social benefits and are insured. We make sure we provide the best service in Switzerland.

EASY PAYMENT
Pay easily with a credit card (Visa, Master, American Express), PostFinance, Lunch-Check or Paypal. Add different payment methods easily. Enter promo codes or gift cards to redeem a discount on your order.

LOCAL AND INTERNATIONAL RESTAURANTS
Black Tap, Chez Philippe, Burger King, McDonald’s, Subway, Vapiano, Baur’s at Home, Marcel, The Hamburger Foundation, Molino, KFC, Bao Canteen, HATO, Yooji’s, Stripped Pizza, Rice Up!, Nooba, Pancs, The Green Van Company and many many more...

Please feel free to reach out to us at any time with your comments and feedback on support.smood.ch

CUSTOMER SERVICE
Our customer support is available everyday from 7am to midnight. You can reach out through phone, email, live chat and Facebook. We are happy to help you in case you have any questions.

We have the best delivery staff in Switzerland. Because our drivers are employed by Smood, they are paid fair wages, have social benefits and are insured. We make sure we provide the best service in Switzerland.

EASY PAYMENT

LOCAL AND INTERNATIONAL RESTAURANTS
Black Tap, Chez Philippe, Burger King, McDonald’s, Subway, Vapiano, Baur’s at Home, Marcel, The Hamburger Foundation, Molino, KFC, Bao Canteen, HATO, Yooji’s, Stripped Pizza, Rice Up!, Nooba, Pancs, The Green Van Company and many many more...

title: Smood: Food Delivery & Take Aw

creator: Smood.ch
descriptionHtml:
"Smood is the Swiss on-demand delivery app. Your favourite restaurants, all your Migros products and much more delivered to your home.
Find everything you need on Smood, and get it delivered in minutes.

Smood was born in 2012 in Switzerland. Our mission: to make your life easier!
Today, we are the only Swiss delivery app present in more than 25 cities across Switzerland: Zurich, Geneva, Lausanne, Bern, Basel, Lugano, Lucerne, Winterthur, among many others.

With Smood, ordering online becomes a breeze:

FIND EVERYTHING YOU NEED
Restaurants
Don't feel like cooking tonight? We deliver to you your nearby restaurants, whether you like sushi, pizza, burgers or world cuisine, there's something for everyone on Smood.
Choose from more than 2,000 restaurants and fast foods such as McDonald's, Burger King, Sushi Shop, Vapiano, KFC, Subway, Molino, The Hamburger Foundation, Yooji's, Nooba, Ona Poke, Tibits, Holy Cow!, Five Guys, Blaqkburger, Popeyes... and your local restaurants.
Filter your search by diet, restaurant ratings, delivery time or fees. There's something for everyone on Smood!

Grocery
Need to do your grocery shopping without queuing? Order your favourite Migros products from an assortment of over 10,000 products at the same price as in the shop.
Find vegetables, fruit, meat, dairy products, a bakery selection, hygiene products and many more.
We also deliver from your local supermarket, bakeries, patisseries, wine shops and small grocery stores.
Shopping has never been so easy with Smood.

Flowers, parapharmaceuticals and beauty products
Smood also delivers flowers with Florissimo and independent florists, as well as pharmaceutical and beauty products with our partner pharmacies.

EITHER DELIVERY OR TAKEAWAY
Have your meal and grocery delivered to your home or office in a few minutes. Choose the time that suits you best, either for immediate delivery or for later by ordering in advance.
Track the progress of your order in real time and be notified when the driver is on his way and about to arrive with your order.
Would you prefer to collect your order yourself? Order with Click&Collect and pick up your order directly from the restaurant or shop.

EASY PAYMENT
Pay easily with a credit card (Visa, Master Card, American Express), PostFinance, Lunch-Check, Reka, Paypal, Twint and even cryptocurrencies.

SPECIAL OFFERS
Looking for good deals? Check out our special offers to treat yourself without breaking the bank.
Enter promotional codes or gift cards to receive a discount on your order.

CUSTOMER SERVICE
Our customer service is available every day from 8am to 11pm. You can reach us by phone, email, live chat or Facebook. We will be happy to help you and answer all your questions.

DELIVERY STAFF
We have the best delivery staff available. Not least because our drivers are employed by Smood, receive a fair wage, have benefits and are obviously insured. We really care about providing the best service in Switzerland.

Please feel free to contact us at any time with your comments and feedback at support@smood.ch."

title: Smood - Home delivery

creator: Smood.ch
descriptionHtml:
Too busy to prepare dinner? Order online with Smood & get Swiss food delivered to your doorstep from 1800+ Top restaurants within 45 minutes. Select from 6000+ Migros products to take care of all your grocery needs.

Enjoy Swiss food from the finest restaurants across 40 cities in Switzerland.

Order Food Online
Get offers & meals delivered from fast food chains like:

● Burger King

● McDonald’s

● KFC

● Subway


What makes Smood the right choice?

✅ Find the best offers & deals on your favorite meals

✅ Choose between online food delivery or Click & Collect service

✅ New and original Swiss meals

✅ Multiply your savings with exclusive Grocery Offers

✅ Customer service that you can count on


App Features

🥡 Order from top restaurants nearby
Get the latest offers for international cuisines, Swiss cuisine, restaurant dishes, and fast food in the market. Enjoy restaurants’ top-quality meals and takeout at home. Grab exciting deals on your next KFC, Burger King or McDonald’s takeaway.

🥫 Shop from Migros
Get 6000+ Migros products delivered to your doorstep by ordering groceries online. Choose from a variety of groceries like organic products, poultry, hygiene products and more.

🧤 Safety
All meals are prepared, handled, packaged, and delivered safely. Smood’s well-trained team of drivers ensures the safest and consistent delivery experience for you.

🛍 Click & Collect
By choosing "Click and Collect", you can pick up your order from a location of your choice.

🚚 Delivery Staff
Smood's drivers are well paid, insured & have social benefits. Services are provided in a professional and safe manner, ensuring timely delivery of orders.

🏨 Local restaurants
Order food online from top local restaurants like Black Tap, Vapiano, Baur’s, Marcel, The Hamburger Foundation, Molino, etc to experience the best of the local and Swiss cuisine.

🎕 Florist
Check out the florist section of the app for a wide range of flowers & bouquets. Discover all local florists in your area or within the selected area for your interest.

📑 Recipes
From cookies to pizza, there are recipes for you to try! Discover a variety of recipes from Swiss, American, European, Chinese, Italian cuisines, and more.

💳 Hassle-free payments
Paying for your orders is both easy and safe on Smood. Payments can be made via credit card (Visa, American Express), PostFinance, Lunch-Check, Paypal, and also TWINT.

⌚ Track your order
Get live tracking and real-time status updates for your orders from the app. From the restaurant to your front door, you can track the location of your Delivery Partner on a map.

📱 Customer Service
Contact us by email, chat bot, or even use Facebook Messenger to resolve any questions or issues related to your delivery.


Here’s what Smood offers:

✔ Food ordering made fast, safe and easy

✔ Order takeaways from Multiple Cuisines

✔ Smart Grocery shopping from home

✔ Enjoy hassle-free ordering whether you're at home or away


🗣 Have Queries? Reach out to us at

📧Email: support@smood.ch
📞Phone: +41 900 009 009


🙋‍♀️ Let’s Connect

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/smood.ch/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/smood.ch

Terms of conditions
https://www.smood.ch/en/terms-of-service

Privacy Policy
https://www.smood.ch/en/privacy-policy

Don't forget to treat yourself today! Download the app now!

title: Smood - Home delivery

creator: Smood.ch
descriptionHtml:
Smood is the Swiss on-demand delivery app. Your favourite restaurants, all your Migros products and much more delivered to your home.
Find everything you need on Smood, and get it delivered in minutes.

Smood was born in 2012 in Switzerland. Our mission: to make your life easier!
Today, we are the only Swiss delivery app present in more than 25 cities across Switzerland: Zurich, Geneva, Lausanne, Bern, Basel, Lugano, Lucerne, Winterthur, among many others.

With Smood, ordering online becomes a breeze:

FIND EVERYTHING YOU NEED
Restaurants
Don't feel like cooking tonight? We deliver to you your nearby restaurants, whether you like sushi, pizza, burgers or world cuisine, there's something for everyone on Smood.
Choose from more than 2,000 restaurants and fast foods such as McDonald's, Burger King, Sushi Shop, Vapiano, KFC, Subway, Molino, The Hamburger Foundation, Yooji's, Nooba, Ona Poke, Tibits, Holy Cow!, Five Guys, Blaqkburger, Popeyes... and your local restaurants.
Filter your search by diet, restaurant ratings, delivery time or fees. There's something for everyone on Smood!

Grocery
Need to do your grocery shopping without queuing? Order your favourite Migros products from an assortment of over 10,000 products at the same price as in the shop.
Find vegetables, fruit, meat, dairy products, a bakery selection, hygiene products and many more.
We also deliver from your local supermarket, bakeries, patisseries, wine shops and small grocery stores.
Shopping has never been so easy with Smood.

Flowers, parapharmaceuticals and beauty products
Smood also delivers flowers with Florissimo and independent florists, as well as pharmaceutical and beauty products with our partner pharmacies.

EITHER DELIVERY OR TAKEAWAY
Have your meal and grocery delivered to your home or office in a few minutes. Choose the time that suits you best, either for immediate delivery or for later by ordering in advance.
Track the progress of your order in real time and be notified when the driver is on his way and about to arrive with your order.
Would you prefer to collect your order yourself? Order with Click&Collect and pick up your order directly from the restaurant or shop.

EASY PAYMENT
Pay easily with a credit card (Visa, Master Card, American Express), PostFinance, Lunch-Check, Reka, Paypal, Twint and even cryptocurrencies.

SPECIAL OFFERS
Looking for good deals? Check out our special offers to treat yourself without breaking the bank.
Enter promotional codes or gift cards to receive a discount on your order.

CUSTOMER SERVICE
Our customer service is available every day from 8am to 11pm. You can reach us by phone, email, live chat or Facebook. We will be happy to help you and answer all your questions.

DELIVERY STAFF
We have the best delivery staff available. Not least because our drivers are employed by Smood, receive a fair wage, have benefits and are obviously insured. We really care about providing the best service in Switzerland.

Please feel free to contact us at any time with your comments and feedback at support@smood.ch.

title: Smood - Home delivery

creator: Smood.ch
descriptionHtml:
What you need, when you need it.

Smood is one of the leading home delivery companies in Switzerland. Founded in Geneva in 2012, Smood now operates in the 25 largest cities in Switzerland.

Initially specialising in home meal delivery, Smood quickly expanded into other areas. With a vocation to be the Swiss Army knife of home delivery, Smood now offers thousands of products for delivery across several categories (groceries, florists, wine shops, parapharmacy and beauty, etc.), all in partnership with emblematic local or national brands.

We are committed to an ongoing process of social responsibility. Smood is one of the only companies in the Swiss home delivery sector where all the delivery staff are employed by the company. As such, the teams benefit from working conditions guaranteed by a Collective Labour Agreement, governed by Swiss law. We are proud to lead the way and offer our employees some of the best working conditions in the industry.

As a Swiss technology company, we develop our own platforms, applications and algorithms to give our customers the ability to order the products they want, when they want. Our customer service is available every day and answers our customers in French, German, Italian and English.

Our mission is to make our customers smile.

Smood in a few figures:
+1150 employees, including 1000 salaried delivery staff
+25 cities in Switzerland
+2500 partner restaurants and shops
+4.5 million smiles delivered

Download the app! Keep Smood at your fingertips to order when you want and where you want. With the app you can stay informed about our exclusive offers, our news and follow your orders in real time.

title: Smood, the Swiss Delivery App

creator: Smood.ch
descriptionHtml:
What you need, when you need it.

Smood is one of the leading home delivery companies in Switzerland. Founded in Geneva in 2012, Smood now operates in the 25 largest cities in Switzerland.

Initially specialising in home meal delivery, Smood quickly expanded into other areas. With a vocation to be the Swiss Army knife of home delivery, Smood now offers thousands of products for delivery across several categories (groceries, florists, wine shops, parapharmacy and beauty, etc.), all in partnership with emblematic local or national brands.

We are committed to an ongoing process of social responsibility. Smood is one of the only companies in the Swiss home delivery sector where all the delivery staff are employed by the company. As such, the teams benefit from working conditions guaranteed by a Collective Labour Agreement, governed by Swiss law. We are proud to lead the way and offer our employees some of the best working conditions in the industry.

As a Swiss technology company, we develop our own platforms, applications and algorithms to give our customers the ability to order the products they want, when they want. Our customer service is available every day and answers our customers in French, German, Italian and English.

Our mission is to make our customers smile.

Smood in a few figures:
+1150 employees, including 1000 salaried delivery staff
+25 cities in Switzerland
+2500 partner restaurants and shops
+4.5 million smiles delivered

Download the app! Keep Smood at your fingertips to order when you want and where you want. With the app you can stay informed about our exclusive offers, our news and follow your orders in real time.

title: Smood, the Swiss Delivery App

creator: Smood.ch
descriptionHtml:
Too busy to prepare dinner? Order online with Smood & get Swiss food delivered to your doorstep from 1800+ Top restaurants within 45 minutes. Select from 6000+ Migros products to take care of all your grocery needs.

Enjoy Swiss food from the finest restaurants across 40 cities in Switzerland.

Order Food Online
Get offers & meals delivered from fast food chains like:

● Burger King

● McDonald’s

● KFC

● Subway


What makes Smood the right choice?

✅ Find the best offers & deals on your favorite meals

✅ Choose between online food delivery or Click & Collect service

✅ New and original Swiss meals

✅ Multiply your savings with exclusive Grocery Offers

✅ Customer service that you can count on


App Features

🥡 Order from top restaurants nearby
Get the latest offers for international cuisines, Swiss cuisine, restaurant dishes, and fast food in the market. Enjoy restaurants’ top-quality meals and takeout at home. Grab exciting deals on your next KFC, Burger King or McDonald’s takeaway.

🥫 Shop from Migros
Get 6000+ Migros products delivered to your doorstep by ordering groceries online. Choose from a variety of groceries like organic products, poultry, hygiene products and more.

🧤 Safety
All meals are prepared, handled, packaged, and delivered safely. Smood’s well-trained team of drivers ensures the safest and consistent delivery experience for you.

🛍 Click & Collect
By choosing "Click and Collect", you can pick up your order from a location of your choice.

🚚 Delivery Staff
Smood's drivers are well paid, insured & have social benefits. Services are provided in a professional and safe manner, ensuring timely delivery of orders.

🏨 Local restaurants
Order food online from top local restaurants like Black Tap, Vapiano, Baur’s, Marcel, The Hamburger Foundation, Molino, etc to experience the best of the local and Swiss cuisine.

🎕 Florist
Check out the florist section of the app for a wide range of flowers & bouquets. Discover all local florists in your area or within the selected area for your interest.

📑 Recipes
From cookies to pizza, there are recipes for you to try! Discover a variety of recipes from Swiss, American, European, Chinese, Italian cuisines, and more.

💳 Hassle-free payments
Paying for your orders is both easy and safe on Smood. Payments can be made via credit card (Visa, American Express), PostFinance, Lunch-Check, Paypal, and also TWINT.

⌚ Track your order
Get live tracking and real-time status updates for your orders from the app. From the restaurant to your front door, you can track the location of your Delivery Partner on a map.

📱 Customer Service
Contact us by email, chat bot, or even use Facebook Messenger to resolve any questions or issues related to your delivery.


Here’s what Smood offers:

✔ Food ordering made fast, safe and easy

✔ Order takeaways from Multiple Cuisines

✔ Smart Grocery shopping from home

✔ Enjoy hassle-free ordering whether you're at home or away


🗣 Have Queries? Reach out to us at

📧Email: support@smood.ch
📞Phone: +41 900 009 009

Too busy to prepare dinner? Order online with Smood & get Swiss food delivered to your doorstep from 1800+ Top restaurants within 45 minutes. Select from 6000+ Migros products to take care of all your grocery needs.

Enjoy Swiss food from the finest restaurants across 40 cities in Switzerland.

Order Food Online
Get offers & meals delivered from fast food chains like:

● Burger King

● McDonald’s

● KFC

● Subway


What makes Smood the right choice?

✅ Find the best offers & deals on your favorite meals

✅ Choose between online food delivery or Click & Collect service

✅ New and original Swiss meals

✅ Multiply your savings with exclusive Grocery Offers

✅ Customer service that you can count on


App Features

🥡 Order from top restaurants nearby
Get the latest offers for international cuisines, Swiss cuisine, restaurant dishes, and fast food in the market. Enjoy restaurants’ top-quality meals and takeout at home. Grab exciting deals on your next KFC, Burger King or McDonald’s takeaway.

🥫 Shop from Migros
Get 6000+ Migros products delivered to your doorstep by ordering groceries online. Choose from a variety of groceries like organic products, poultry, hygiene products and more.

🧤 Safety
All meals are prepared, handled, packaged, and delivered safely. Smood’s well-trained team of drivers ensures the safest and consistent delivery experience for you.

🛍 Click & Collect
By choosing "Click and Collect", you can pick up your order from a location of your choice.

🚚 Delivery Staff
Smood's drivers are well paid, insured & have social benefits. Services are provided in a professional and safe manner, ensuring timely delivery of orders.

🏨 Local restaurants
Order food online from top local restaurants like Black Tap, Vapiano, Baur’s, Marcel, The Hamburger Foundation, Molino, etc to experience the best of the local and Swiss cuisine.

🎕 Florist
Check out the florist section of the app for a wide range of flowers & bouquets. Discover all local florists in your area or within the selected area for your interest.

📑 Recipes
From cookies to pizza, there are recipes for you to try! Discover a variety of recipes from Swiss, American, European, Chinese, Italian cuisines, and more.

💳 Hassle-free payments
Paying for your orders is both easy and safe on Smood. Payments can be made via credit card (Visa, American Express), PostFinance, Lunch-Check, Paypal, and also TWINT.

⌚ Track your order
Get live tracking and real-time status updates for your orders from the app. From the restaurant to your front door, you can track the location of your Delivery Partner on a map.

📱 Customer Service
Contact us by email, chat bot, or even use Facebook Messenger to resolve any questions or issues related to your delivery.


Here’s what Smood offers:

✔ Food ordering made fast, safe and easy

✔ Order takeaways from Multiple Cuisines

✔ Smart Grocery shopping from home

✔ Enjoy hassle-free ordering whether you're at home or away


🗣 Have Queries? Reach out to us at

📧Email: support@smood.ch
📞Phone: +41 900 009 009


🙋‍♀️ Let’s Connect

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/smood.ch/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/smood.ch

https://www.smood.ch/en/terms-of-service

Privacy Policy
https://www.smood.ch/en/privacy-policy

title:
Smood, the Swiss Delivery App
6.26.0

creator: Smood.ch
descriptionHtml:
What you need, when you need it.

Smood is one of the leading home delivery companies in Switzerland. Founded in Geneva in 2012, Smood now operates in the 25 largest cities in Switzerland.

Initially specialising in home meal delivery, Smood quickly expanded into other areas. With a vocation to be the Swiss Army knife of home delivery, Smood now offers thousands of products for delivery across several categories (groceries, florists, wine shops, parapharmacy and beauty, etc.), all in partnership with emblematic local or national brands.

We are committed to an ongoing process of social responsibility. Smood is one of the only companies in the Swiss home delivery sector where all the delivery staff are employed by the company. As such, the teams benefit from working conditions guaranteed by a Collective Labour Agreement, governed by Swiss law. We are proud to lead the way and offer our employees some of the best working conditions in the industry.

As a Swiss technology company, we develop our own platforms, applications and algorithms to give our customers the ability to order the products they want, when they want. Our customer service is available every day and answers our customers in French, German, Italian and English.

Our mission is to make our customers smile.

Smood in a few figures:
+1150 employees, including 1000 salaried delivery staff
+25 cities in Switzerland
+2500 partner restaurants and shops
+4.5 million smiles delivered

Download the app! Keep Smood at your fingertips to order when you want and where you want. With the app you can stay informed about our exclusive offers, our news and follow your orders in real time.
